key_title: Key to the species of Lepyrodia

Key to the families of Monocotyledons
Key to the genera of Restionaceae

source.author: Conn, B.J.
source.title: Restionaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons
source.citation: From: Conn, B.J. (1994). Restionaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaf-sheaths mostly confined to base of plant, not striate; plant dioecious
Leaf-sheaths spaced along stem, if deciduous then scars present, striate; plant monoecious or dioecious
Stems straight to slightly curved, never flexuose; inflorescence with flowers in shortly pedicellate clusters; plants monoecious or dioecious
Stems flexuose on flower-bearing part; inflorescence with flowers in sessile clusters; plants dioecious
